The council will explore opportunities to take waste management in house or work in partnership in order to maximise the extraction of resources and financial returns from the waste the borough generates. 20.15 The borough is not allocating individual sites for waste but instead identifying areas of search within which individual sites could come forward; this approach is supported by both national policy and the waste industry.
